# How to Contribute

> Thank you for your interest in Pinwheel!

Please use the [*Bug Report*](https://github.com/azigler/pinwheel/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=bug-report.md&title=) or [*Feature Request*](https://github.com/azigler/pinwheel/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=feature-request.md&title=) issue templates to discuss any bugs or potential contributions to Pinwheel. Pinwheel is highly opinionated and not all suggestions are ultimately compatible with the design of the engine.

Respect the [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/azigler/pinwheel/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) when interacting with the community or contributing to the project.

## Community
[![Gossip](https://img.shields.io/badge/Gossip-%20MUD%20chat%20network-brightgreen.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://gossip.haus/)
[![MUD Coders Slack](https://slack.mudcoders.com/badge.svg)](https://slack.mudcoders.com/)
[![Ranvier MUD Engine](https://img.shields.io/badge/Ranvier-MUD%20engine-brightgreen.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/RanvierMUD/ranviermud)

Pinwheel is compatible with the [Gossip MUD Chat Network](https://gossip.haus/). The project is maintained by Andrew Zigler, a member of [the MUD Coders Guild](https://mudcoders.com/). Respect the rules of other communities when representing Pinwheel.

MUD enthusiasts, worldbuilding writers, hobbyist coders, niche gamers, and curious newcomers are all welcome to join the [Slack](https://slack.mudcoders.com/) and discuss projects like Pinwheel with us.
